review: Getting this stick inspired me to get a GaiamTV subscription because it was featured on only the Fire Stick! I've never been so healthy since, and I absolutely love all the features on the stick. I also have AppleTV. I find that the Fire Stick tops AppleTV with all of the available apps. Redbull TV I noticed popped up on there, Pilates apps, GaiamTV, there's so much! Now, if I could just figure out how to "AirPlay" on to my fire stick using my iPad 😁
